searchengine.spider
Class PriorityBasedSpider

java.lang.Object
  searchengine.spider.PriorityBasedSpider
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpiderInterface
public class PriorityBasedSpider
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpiderInterface

Web-crawling objects. Instances of this class will crawl a given web site in Priority-first order.

          The maximum number of pages to crawl.
